text: Ukubanina(bangakholwayo) benisolokonithandazelauloyiso nomgwebo, umgwebo ufikile ke ngoku kuni; ukanti ukuba niyayeka kobangcono (oko) kuni, ukanti ukuba niphindela kwasedabini naThi Siyaphindela, ukanti imikhosi yenu ayiyi kuninceda nto; enokuba ingaba mikhulu kangakanani na; Inene uAll√¢h Ukunye nabakholwayo
